name: Hueshift
description:
RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

HUESHIFT is an endless runner in a colorful world. Dodge meteors, collect coins, and run for as long as possible to secure a high score!

Controls:
  • A, D or Left, Right - Move
  • TAP space - jump a little bit
  • HOLD space - jump high
  • Run against a wall to wallrun!
Have fun and thank you for playing!

Please leave any feedback down below :)
